p:
Other than AgNPs, gold nanoparticles (AuNPs) are also promising virucidal agents. AuNPs synthesized using garlic extract with an average size of 6 nm showed virucidal activity against the measles virus by also binding to surface viral receptors and preventing subsequent host cell binding and infection.
194 However, due to the cost of the gold chemical precursors, AuNPs are unlikely to become cheap and commercially widely available disinfecting agents.
